products.description: Cloud-based web applications allow anyone to perform complex operations and analyzes with intuitive controls that support each manufacturer's APIs and formats, regardless of location or environment.
products.title: List of Applications

ias.title: Image analysis web application I A S
ias.contact_des: We also accept requests for additional functions and inquiries as to whether your data can be analyzed.
ias.customer_des1: It is easier to use and produce results than conventional analysis software. I used to analyze it in the laboratory until late, but since it is a web application, I can analyze it after returning home, which is comfortable.
ias.customer_des2: Microscopes from various manufactures are mixed in the laboratory, and each analysis I had to learn the software. With this software, you can analyze all the data in the laboratory!
ias.description_matadata_con: Supports multidimensional data and complex big data by supoorting metafiles from various microcope manufactures.
ias.description_discussion_con: Since it is a cloud-compatible web application, ir also supports remote discussions. It is easy to judge because it observes the data directly.
ias.description_functions_con: Complicated analysis can be easily performed by incorporating deep learning and machine learning functions.
ias.description_operation_con: Business efficiency can he improved by connecting the target device to the API and performing remote control.
ias.function1_text: It is easy to extract object that were difficult to recognize in the past.
ias.function2_text: Supports 3D time lapse, HCA, and tiling 3D.
ias.function3_text: It supports libraries in various situations, and of course we also help you create libraries(optional).
ias.function4_text: With our unique Know-how, we can read and analyze data that could only be analyzed by that manufacture in the past.
ias.function5_text: Since it is a web application, you can contact us if you have any questions or want to consult on the spot. Even beginners can use it with confodence, Otically improving work efficiency.
ias.subscription_des: Low initial investment and can be used with the latest version

flowcal.title: flowcal, a web app for flow cytometry
flowcal.contact_des: We also accept requests for additional functions and inquiries as to whether your data can be analyzed.
flowcal.customer_des1: It's very easy to use, and I thought it would be ideal for remote discussions and collaborative research.
flowcal.customer_des2: Through machine learning and deep learning, I think that it is very useful because it can process multiple samples and notice that it may be overlooked in the past.
flowcal.description_methods_con: It also supports high-demensional analysis such as v-NSE analysis, SPADE analysis, FLowSOM, and CITRUS.
flowcal.description_discussion_con: Since it is a cloud-compatible web application, ir also supports remote discussions. It is easy to judge because it observes the data directly.
flowcal.description_functions_con: Deep learning and machine learning functions can be introduced at low cost for subscription sales.
flowcal.description_operation_con: Business efficiency can he improved by connecting the target device to the API and performing remote control.
flowcal.function1_text: The easy-to-use interface allows you to create comprehecsive data analysis workflows.chat support is also available to assist you in case of operational difficulties or more complex analysis.
flowcal.function2_text: The use of a highly secure cloud enhances data intefrity, and authorization allows for remote discussions
flowcal.function3_title: Compatible with V-NSE, FlowSOM, SPADE, CITRUS, UMAP, etc
flowcal.function3_text: Automatically cluster cells with similar phenotypes or plot data in multiple dimensions for visualization. Automatically classify cell data and identify targets by statistical prediction across sample groups.
flowcal.function4_title: Support for machine learning and deep learning
flowcal.function4_text: Supprot for machine learning and deep learning make it easier to analyze big data.
flowcal.function5_text: By supporting subsctiotion sales, reseatch testing can be started with little initial investment.
flowcal.subscription_des: Low initial investment and can be used with the latest version

purchase.ias_des: The above amount does not include tax.
purchase.flowcal_des: It will be in beta, But please contact us if you would like to evaluate it.

about.ads1: We solve the problems of the world through web apps
about.ads2: We will develop web applications in the fields of life science, medical care, and industry and sell them domestically and overseas.
about.intro1: I myself have been engaged in research and inspection manufacturers for more than 20 years, but the handling of specialized equipment and software is sophisticated, and the operations and format formats differ depending on the manufacturer, and people in the field are having a hard time. I have come across it.
about.intro2: In recent years, remote examination / diagnosis and joint research are progressing, and the demand for home office, remote control, and automation by COVID-19 is increasing.
about.intro3: In order to solve these problems, we will contribute to society by launching a web application business in the research and inspection fields.
about.business_desc2: Development and sales of Web applications in the fields of life science, medical care, and industry
about.customer2: Broad Institute, INFORM, University of Bayer, UCSanDiego, University of Tokyo, National Cancer Center, etc
about.his1_val: Image analysis Web application IAS Î² version released
about.his2_val: Yokohama Business Grand Prix Excellence Award
about.buss1_description: Development and sales of image analysis and remote control Web applications in the fields of life science, medical care, and industry
about.buss2_description: Development and sales of analysis web applications for flow cytometry
about.buss3_description: Development and sales of analysis Web applications for next-generation sequencers
about.buss4_description: Development and sales of web applications for visual inspection and remote control / analysis using drones

foot_description: Development and sales of Researches & Developments inspection products
welcome_description: Remote analysis for all researches & developments

homepage.about_des: We develop and sell cloud-based analysis web applications used in research and inspection that match new work styles.

homepage.feature_clude_content: You can easily perform remote work and remote discussions regardless of the OS.
homepage.feature_supprot_content: We have the know-how to read and optimize different emtadata and ijformation for each manufacturer.
homepage.feature_deep_content: By supporting deep learning and machine learning, operations and procedures are very easy and highly accurate.
homepage.feature_sale_content: The initial installation cost is reduced and it can be used with the latest version.
homepage.intro_subcontent: Watch a video summarizing the features of 4 products.
homepage.subscription_des: The initial installation cost is reduced and it can be used with the latest version.

terms.title: Application Terms of Use (Subscription Service)
terms.description: These Application Terms and Conditions ('Terms and Conditions') apply to transactions in which LifeAnalytics ('Company') grants you (either an individual or a corporation) a non-exclusive right to use this application product for a specified period of time ('Subscription'). The following terms and conditions apply to transactions in which we grant you (either an individual or a corporation) a non-exclusive right to use the Application Product for a specified period of time ('Subscription'). The following terms and conditions apply to transactions in which the Company grants to a user (whether an individual or a corporation) a non-exclusive right to use the Application Product for a limited period of time (hereinafter referred to as 'Subscription').

text1.title: this application
text1.description: The application program and related documentation/accessories that we grant to you for use of the Subscription.

text2.title: form of subscription license
text2.description: An Internet connection is required to authenticate this application.

part2.title: Article 2 (License)
part2.description1: The Application may be used by users belonging to the corporation or organization to which the Subscription Applicant belongs (hereinafter referred to as 'User') up to the number of licenses granted.
part2.description2: This application may only be used by the licensed user and only for the user's own business purposes.

text1.title: subscription application
text1.description: Users shall apply for use of the Service through the 'Application for Use' after agreeing to the Terms of Use.

text2.title: conclusion of contract by application
text2.description: A contract is considered to be formed when we confirm your application for a subscription purchase using the Subscription Purchase Application Form.

text3.title: Cancellation in the middle of the application process
text3.description: If the user cancels the contract for his/her own reason within the contract period, the usage fees already paid shall not be refunded.

text4.title: Contracts through sales agents
text4.description: When a user applies for a contract through an agent, the formation or termination of the contract shall be determined separately by the Company and the agent.

part4.title: Article 4 (Term of Contract)
part4.text1: The term of the contract shall begin on the date the license is registered on our license server.
part4.text2: The number of days of the contract period shall be the number of days for each plan.
part4.text3: Unless you request 'contract cancellation' during the contract period, the contract will automatically continue with the same plan.
part4.text4: To cancel a subscription, click 'Cancel Subscription' during the subscription period and request cancellation.

part5.title: Article 5 (Fees)
part5.description1: Fees shall be in accordance with the 'Application Price List' separately determined by the Company. However, the 'Application Price List' is subject to change without notice.
part5.description2: The separately determined periodic fee shall apply only to the initial contract period and the consecutive contract periods.

part6.title: Article 6 (Scope of Warranty)
part6.description: The User has the right to use the latest version of the contracted application and its successor products during the term of the contract.

part7.title: Article 7 (Cancellation of Contract)
part7.description1: We may terminate this License Agreement if the User violates these Terms of Use or the Application License Agreement. In such case, the User's access to the Application will be immediately restricted and the User will not be able to use the Application thereafter.
part7.description2: In the above cases, fees already paid shall not be refunded.

part8.title: Article 8 (Consultation)
part8.description: Any matter not stipulated in these Terms of Use or any question that may arise shall be resolved through consultation between the user and the Company.

part9.title: Article 9 (Jurisdiction)
part9.description: The Yokohama District Court shall be the court of jurisdiction for any disputes related to these Terms of Use.
